title: How to Make Kiwifruit Salad

steps.headline: Gather the ingredients.
steps.description:
For this salad, you'll need:
Grated ginger
Mayonnaise
Freshly squeezed lemon juice
Diced chicken or you can sear some chicken fillets at home and dice it. Diced kiwifruit (at least 2 kiwifruits)
Peeled and diced mangoes
Chopped romaine lettuce
Toasted and salted cashews
Mint sprigs for garnishing.

steps.headline: Smear salt and pepper on chicken fillets and sear them in a pan of olive oil.
steps.description: When it cools down dice it into cubes.

steps.headline: Grate ginger and extract the juice.
steps.description: This will add a special kick to your salad

steps.headline: Blend mayonnaise, lemon juice and zest and ginger juice.
Add chicken, diced mangoes and kiwis and blend it well with the mayonnaise mixture.
Season the salad with salt and coarse pepper.
Decorate a bowl with chopped lettuce.The lettuce will add the crunch to your salad
Pour the chicken mixture.
Garnish with diced kiwifruit and mint sprigs.
Gather the ingredients.
steps.description:
For this salad, you'll need:
Shredded lettuce
Diced kiwifruit
Quarter cup toasted pecans
Thick vanilla flavored yogurt, preferably Greek yogurt
Lemon juice
Olive oil
Honey.

steps.headline: Blend the thick yogurt with honey, lemon juice and olive oil until the mixture is smooth.
Place the lettuce, kiwifruit and pecans in a bowl.
Pour the yogurt mixture on the kiwifruit and pecans.
Toss it to blend.
Serve immediately.
Gather the ingredients.
steps.description:
For this salad, you'll need:
Some fresh strawberries and cut them into halves
A bottle of olive oil or refined oil, to sprinkle on the salad
Blanched spinach, cut into tiny pieces. Raspberry vinegar and raspberry jam
Walnuts, roughly chopped
Kiwifruit peeled and cut into any shape.

steps.headline: Place strawberries, walnuts, spinach and kiwifruits in a bowl.
Pour a mixture of raspberry vinegar, jam and oil over the salad ingredients.
steps.description: Add mint or oregano, or any spice if you want, although these are optional.

steps.headline: Toss and serve this crunchy and healthy salad.
Gather the ingredients.
steps.description:
For this salad, you'll need:
Romaine Lettuce cut or shredded. Kiwifruits cut into quarter inch slices
Orange wedges and freshly squeezed orange juice
Olive oil
Apple cider
Lemon juice
Toasted almonds.

steps.headline: Make the dressing first.
steps.description: Blend one and a half tablespoons of olive oil, apple cider, lemon and orange juice. Add salt and sugar to season.

steps.headline: Drizzle this dressing on a bowl of chopped lettuce, kiwifruit and orange segments.
steps.description: You can add apples or grapes that add to the taste and crunch.

steps.headline: Use mint sprigs and toasted almond to garnish.
Gather the ingredients.
steps.description:
For this salad, you'll need:
Olive or refined oil
Sweetcorn kernels
Finely sliced onion
Chopped kiwifruit
A can of drained pinto beans
Red capsicum (bell pepper)
Slit green chili
Lemon juice
Salt.

steps.headline: Add little oil to your nonstick pan and cook the corn in a medium heat.
Transfer the corn in a bowl and add the remaining ingredients and toss.
Serve piping hot.

text:
Spicy Chicken Kiwifruit Salad Gather the ingredients. For this salad, you'll need:
Grated ginger
Mayonnaise
Freshly squeezed lemon juice
Diced chicken or you can sear some chicken fillets at home and dice it. Diced kiwifruit (at least 2 kiwifruits)
Peeled and diced mangoes
Chopped romaine lettuce
Toasted and salted cashews
Mint sprigs for garnishing. Smear salt and pepper on chicken fillets and sear them in a pan of olive oil. When it cools down dice it into cubes. Grate ginger and extract the juice. This will add a special kick to your salad Blend mayonnaise, lemon juice and zest and ginger juice.  Add chicken, diced mangoes and kiwis and blend it well with the mayonnaise mixture.  Season the salad with salt and coarse pepper.  Decorate a bowl with chopped lettuce.The lettuce will add the crunch to your salad  Pour the chicken mixture.  Garnish with diced kiwifruit and mint sprigs.  Honeyed Kiwifruit And Pecan Salad Gather the ingredients. For this salad, you'll need:
Shredded lettuce
Diced kiwifruit
Quarter cup toasted pecans
Thick vanilla flavored yogurt, preferably Greek yogurt
Lemon juice
Olive oil
Honey. Blend the thick yogurt with honey, lemon juice and olive oil until the mixture is smooth.  Place the lettuce, kiwifruit and pecans in a bowl.  Pour the yogurt mixture on the kiwifruit and pecans.  Toss it to blend.  Serve immediately.  Berry, Spinach and Kiwifruit Salad Gather the ingredients. For this salad, you'll need:
Some fresh strawberries and cut them into halves
A bottle of olive oil or refined oil, to sprinkle on the salad
Blanched spinach, cut into tiny pieces. Raspberry vinegar and raspberry jam
Walnuts, roughly chopped
Kiwifruit peeled and cut into any shape. Place strawberries, walnuts, spinach and kiwifruits in a bowl.  Pour a mixture of raspberry vinegar, jam and oil over the salad ingredients. Add mint or oregano, or any spice if you want, although these are optional. Toss and serve this crunchy and healthy salad.  Orange Kiwifruit Salad Gather the ingredients. For this salad, you'll need:
Romaine Lettuce cut or shredded. Kiwifruits cut into quarter inch slices
Orange wedges and freshly squeezed orange juice
Olive oil
Apple cider
Lemon juice
Toasted almonds. Make the dressing first. Blend one and a half tablespoons of olive oil, apple cider, lemon and orange juice. Add salt and sugar to season. Drizzle this dressing on a bowl of chopped lettuce, kiwifruit and orange segments. You can add apples or grapes that add to the taste and crunch. Use mint sprigs and toasted almond to garnish.  Roasted Corn and Kiwifruit Salad Gather the ingredients. For this salad, you'll need:
Olive or refined oil
Sweetcorn kernels
Finely sliced onion
Chopped kiwifruit
A can of drained pinto beans
Red capsicum (bell pepper)
Slit green chili
Lemon juice
Salt. Add little oil to your nonstick pan and cook the corn in a medium heat.  Transfer the corn in a bowl and add the remaining ingredients and toss.  Serve piping hot.
